scripts.migrate: docker exec laravel_invoice_app php artisan migrate
scripts.migrate:rollback: docker exec laravel_invoice_app php artisan migrate:rollback
scripts.seed: docker exec laravel_invoice_app php artisan db:seed
scripts.test: docker exec laravel_invoice_app php artisan test
scripts.schedule:run: docker exec laravel_invoice_app php artisan schedule:run
scripts.queue:listen: docker exec laravel_invoice_app php artisan queue:listen
scripts.queue:work: docker exec laravel_invoice_app php artisan queue:work
